metadata.name: SHRED A RARE PEPE - ALPHA EDITION
metadata.description:
This NFT is a tribute to the original RAREPEPE collection, dropped on the Bitcoin blockchain in 2016 by 100s creators. It's not a game, it's a history book of dankness.

No public roadmap, no socials. Might unlock access to alpha projects and exclusive drops. For now Giveaways for Holders. Register, get a codename, follow the twitter, enjoy destroying the most precious NFTs that will ever exist.

Keep coming back, 'cause this message might just switch up on ya. Stay tuned for updates and surprises. You won't want to miss a beat!

Due to Marketplaces limiting  javascript in NFTs, register your Shredder at https://mpra.surge.sh  
Snapshots will be taken before every giveaway, only holders will participate. 
One codename is enough for multiple Shredders. To participate, drop your codename in tweets' comments.

ipfs://QmX2NwaEYUkPkGzsr2ngoYhS5JB6i5ZVL3KzQYnYSBQDcU
